nodes.text: The Lucent Square was an area in the commercial zone of Promenade in the city-world of Nar Shaddaa. It contained a giant statue of Karagga the Unyielding in the center of it and was thriving with people during the Cold War between the Republic and the Sith Empire. Around 3639 BBY, the Chevin Conglomerate announced the Grand Acquisitions Race there, through the use of a hologram of considerable projection size, near the Hutt statue.
